ygData.subject: RE: Magical Gloves? (Added: Bard Revenge?)
ygData.msgSnippet: hmm, I think I will try my chords of dissoannce song. have not used it since the guard whacked me.  I wonder how all of the orc s will like it?  oh my
ygData.messageBody:
"hmm, I think I will try my chords of dissoannce song. have not used it
since the guard whacked me. I wonder how all of the orc's will like it? oh
my goodness they really don't like it! lots of them really don't like it!
Help! help! help! I better run for the zone! no wait, there is that
powerful caster maybe he will help me if I run over to him! Help! help!
Please zap the dorcs off me help!"

now can u mem your songs faster than he can mem his spells? course he was
bound right across the zone and you were bound in the arena <oh well>

now if you have an enchanter friend or a high level bard friend who can mez
and memblur or charm... well that's another story - hehe love to see the
evil killstealer casters burn that mana casting on a charmed mob <eg>

Sylly
Bard of the 18th level
a.k.a. Robo-Bard
waiting for the boats in ButcherBlock
somewhere on Innoruuk
